sentences: Yellowstone National Park is a national park <<||>> primarily in the US state of Wyoming, although it also <<||>> into Montana and Idaho. Yellowstone Park is the largest and <<||>> megafauna location in the Continental United States. (...) In an effort to minimize the chances of <<||>> fires and threats to people and structures, park employees do more than just monitor the <<||>> for fire. Controlled burns are prescribed fires which are <<||>> started to remove dead timber under conditions which allow fire fighters an <<||>> to carefully control where and how much wood is consumed. Yellowstone climate is greatly influenced by <<||>>, with lower elevations generally found to be warmer year round. Hunting is not <<||>>, though it is allowed in the surrounding national forests during <<||>>. Fishing is a popular activity, and a Yellowstone Park <<||>> is required to fish in park waters.
